definition: The date the digital object was last updated. Must conform to the ISO 8601 standard.
Numeric value for the area of the feature in square meters.
Numeric value for the length dimension of the feature in meters.
Coordinates for the bounding box describing the spatial extent covered by the digital object, in decimal degrees.
validation: Array: Decimal Degrees or Geometry: Polygon

definition: Method for determining accuracy of the data.
Method for determining accuracy of the data.
